meanings.definition: The quality of being an exemplar.
meanings.sent1: Her kindness and generosity are exemplarities for all to follow.
meanings.sent2: The teacher used exemplary student work as exemplarities for the class.
meanings.sent3: The exemplarities of good manners made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His leadership skills set exemplarities that inspired the team.
meanings.sent5: The exemplarities of courage shone brightly in her actions.

meanings.sent1: The museum displayed various exemplarities of ancient artifacts.
meanings.sent2: She provided exemplarities of successful marketing strategies.
meanings.sent3: The cake was an exemplarity of a baking disaster.
meanings.sent4: His garden was an exemplarity of nature's beauty.
meanings.sent5: The book contained exemplarities of different art styles throughout history.
